table_of_contents.title: Overview of the President's 10-year budget plan

Major policy initiatives: (Pay down the federal debt. Provide tax relief for American families. Strengthen and reform education. Modernize and reform Social Security. Modernize and reform Medicare. Revitalize national defense. Champion compassionate conservatism)

Other key priorities: (Assist Americans with disabilities. Combat crime and drug abuse. Create a comprehensive energy policy. Protect the environment. Strengthen families. Invest in health care. Reform the immigration system. Promote volunteerism).

subtitle: a responsible budget for America's priorities
contributions: United States. Office of Management and Budget.
title: A blueprint for new beginnings
publishers: Office of Management and Budget, Executive Office of the President

notes.value: President's message transmitting this document delivered February 28, 2001
